info.title: wescale product API
info.description:
The wescale product API can be used to retrieve detailed information of products from shopping. The available products are determined by the
content visibility of the requesting user. More accurate it depends on the content channels assigned to the user and the content sources these
channels contain (multi content channel management).

The API offers operations to retrieve data for a single product as well as operations to retrieve data from multiple products at once.

In addition to general information about a product further information like reference products, similar products and optimizations are avaialble.

## Reference products
Some products are bundeled with others and can only be ordered together. A notebook for example might be bundeled with a docksting station as a
mandatory accessory. The reference products can be retrieved for every visible procuct based on its stable identifier. If necessary the type of
the reference products can be restricted.

## Similar products
For many products there are alternative products available that are quite similar to the original one but might be better suited for the users's
needs. A switch with 8 ports from another manuafacturer might even be cheaper than a 5 port switch. In order to make this alternatives visible to
the user the similar products can be retrieved for every visible procuct based on its stable identifier.

In addition similar items can be retrieved for non-catalog items based on information like short and long description.

## Optimizations
Some products might be available from multiple suppliers but on different terms. One supplier might offer a better price another one a faster
delivery time. In order to support the users in optimizing their purchases in the best way possible available alternatives can be retrieved for
every visible procuct based on its stable identifier and the respective quantity.

In addition optimizations can be retrieved for non-catalog items based on information like article numbers and supplier or manufacturer name.

get.description: Get a specific product from the collection based on the stable identifier.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Preferred language for information retrieval.

parameters.name: product-id
parameters.description: The stable identifier of the product in wescale.

404.description: The product has not been found.

post.description:
Get a list of details for multiple products from the collection based on the stable identifier.

`GET with body` Since the size of the request parameters might exceed the maximum length of the URL and to avoid parameter encoding the
operation uses `POST` instead of `GET` even though no data is created.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Preferred language for information retrieval.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The products to get.

get.description: Get a list of reference products for a specific product from the collection based on the stable identifier.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Preferred language for information retrieval.

parameters.name: product-id
parameters.description: The stable identifier of the product in wescale.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of entries per page, also known as page size.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Numeric offset identifying the first page entry.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to sort by. The sorting direction is indicated by prefixes '+' (ascending, default) or '-' (descending), e.g. `sort=+name`.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Comma separated list of types of refrences to return.

200.description: The list of reference products of the product.

404.description: The product has not been found.

post.description:
Get a list of reference products for multiple products from the collection based on the stable identifier.

`GET with body` Since the size of the request parameters might exceed the maximum length of the URL and to avoid parameter encoding the
operation uses `POST` instead of `GET` even though no data is created.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Preferred language for information retrieval.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The products to get reference products for.

200.description: The list of reference products of the products.

get.description: Get a list of similar products for a specific product from the collection based on the stable identifier.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Preferred language for information retrieval.

parameters.name: product-id
parameters.description: The stable identifier of the product in wescale.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of entries per page, also known as page size.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Numeric offset identifying the first page entry.

200.description: The list of similar products of the product.

404.description: The product has not been found.

get.description: Get a list of optimizations for a specific product from the collection based on the stable identifier.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Preferred language for information retrieval.

parameters.name: product-id
parameters.description: The stable identifier of the product in wescale.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: Quantity the optimizations should be based on.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of entries per page, also known as page size.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Numeric offset identifying the first page entry.

200.description: The list of optimizations of the product.

404.description: The product has not been found.

post.description:
Get a list of optimizations for multiple products from the collection based on the stable identifier.

`GET with body` Since the size of the request parameters might exceed the maximum length of the URL and to avoid parameter encoding the
operation uses `POST` instead of `GET` even though no data is created.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Preferred language for information retrieval.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The products to get optimizations for.

200.description: The list of optimizations of the products.

post.description:
Get a list of similar products for multiple products from the collection based on the stable identifier.

`GET with body` Since the size of the request parameters might exceed the maximum length of the URL and to avoid parameter encoding the
operation uses `POST` instead of `GET` even though no data is created.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Preferred language for information retrieval.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The products to get similar products for.

200.description: The list of similar products of the products.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Representation of a product containing all available information.

tenant_id.description: Unique identifier of the wescale tenant.

stable_id.description: Stable identifier of the product (generated based on the catalog label and the supplier part number).

name.description: Display name or rather short description.

description.description: Detailed description or rather long description.

is_daily_price.description: Flag indicating if the price is daily based.

is_visible.description: Flag indicating if the product is visible and can be found.

is_orderable.description: Flag indicating if the product can be ordered.

is_incomplete.description: Flag indicating if the product is incomplete.

is_service.description: Flag indicating if the product is a service item.

is_managed.description: Flag indicating if the product is managed by an external provider.

managed_type.description: Managed type of the item. Only relevant in combination with `is_managed=true`.

is_configurable.description: Flag indicating if the product must be configured.

images.description: List of images extracted from the attachments.

unique_id.description: Unique identifier of the catalog in wescale.

stable_id.description: Stable identifier of the catalog in wescale.

label.description: Unique label of the catalog within the wescale tenant.

mpcc.description: Unique Meplato Company Code of the merchant.

mpsc.description: Meplato Supplier Code of the merchant.

supplier.description: Product identifier of the supplier, e.g. supplier sku or item number.

manufacturer.description: Product identifier of the manufacturer, e.g. manufacturers article number.

buyer.description: Product identifier of the purchasing organization, e.g. material item number in stock.

previous.description: List of identifiers this product had before.

replaced.description: List of identifiers this product replaces.

minimum_quantity.description: Minimum order quantity of the item, e.g. must be at least 10 packs.

maximum_quantity.description: Maximum order quantity of the item, e.g. only 1 eBook could be ordered.

interval_quantity.description: Interval order quantity of the item, e.g. could be ordered in amounts of 10, 20, 30 packs and so on.

packaging_quantity.description: Packaging quantity of the item, e.g. 1 pack contains 10 pieces.

price_quantity.description: Price is specified for a certain order quantity of units, e.g. 100 means that 100 units are ordered for a price of 92.100 USD.

order_price.description: Price of the item in the given currency for the specified price quantity, e.g. 92.100 USD for 100 packs. This is the orderable price.

unit_price.description: Calculated price for a single order unit, e.g. 0.921 USD for 1 pack ordered at a price of 92.100 USD for 100 packs. Non-orderable price, it is just for display purposes.

item_price.description: Calculated price for one single item if a packaging unit and packaging quantity is given, e.g. 0.0921 USD for each piece in 1 pack ordered at a price of 92.100 USD for 100 packs containing 10 pieces per pack. Non-orderable price, it is just for display purposes.

lower_bound.description: Lower-bound quantity for which the price is applicable.

ProductDisplayPrices.title: ProductDisplayPrices
ProductDisplayPrices.description: Representation of price information converted in the user's display currency.

schema.description: Schema of the additional attribute. Arbitrary value used for namespacing attributes.

key.description: Unique identifier of the additional attribute.

path.description: Complete paths of the category within the hierarchy.

id.description: The feature id is a combination of kind and non-translated name,

display_value.description: Localized name of the feature (if available).

ProductFeatureValue.title: ProductFeatureValue
ProductFeatureValue.description: Representation of the value of a feature.

display_value.description: Localized value of the feature (if available).

catalog_label.description: Label of the catalog containing the reference.

supplier_pid.description: Supplier product identifier of the reference.

ProductSpecialTreatmentClass.title: ProductSpecialTreatmentClass
ProductSpecialTreatmentClass.description: Representation of a special treatment class.

ProductsBulkRequest.title: ProductsBulkRequest
ProductsBulkRequest.description: Representation of a search request for products.

ProductsBulkResponse.title: ProductsBulkResponse
ProductsBulkResponse.description: Representation of a search response for products.

_total_count.description: Total count of reference products found.

ReferenceProductsParams.title: ReferenceProductsParams
ReferenceProductsParams.description: Representation of the search parameters for reference products.

ReferenceProductsBulkRequest.title: ReferenceProductsBulkRequest
ReferenceProductsBulkRequest.description: Representation of a search request for reference products.

ReferenceProductsBulkResponse.title: ReferenceProductsBulkResponse
ReferenceProductsBulkResponse.description: Representation of a search response for reference products.

items.description: List of reference products grouped by stable product identifier.

_total_count.description: Total count of reference products found.
Total count of similar products found.

SimilarProductsParams.title: SimilarProductsParams
SimilarProductsParams.description: Representation of the search parameters for similar procucts.

SimilarProductsBulkRequest.title: SimilarProductsBulkRequest
SimilarProductsBulkRequest.description: Representation of a search request for similar products.

items.description: List of items to search similar products for.

item_id.description: Unique item identifier that is returned in the response.

product_id.description: Stable product identifiers. If this field is provided all following fields will be ignored.

name.description: Display name or rather short description of the item.

description.description: Detailed description or rather long description of the item.

SimilarProductsBulkResponse.title: SimilarProductsBulkResponse
SimilarProductsBulkResponse.description: Representation of a search response for similar products.

items.description: List of similar products grouped by unique item identifier.

item_id.description: Unique item identifier from the request.

_total_count.description: Total count of similar products found.

OptimizationsParams.title: OptimizationsParams
OptimizationsParams.description: Representation of the search parameters for optimizations.

OptimizationDeliveryTimeInfo.title: OptimizationDeliveryTimeInfo
OptimizationDeliveryTimeInfo.description: Representation of a relevant field for an optimization.

result.description: The comparison result for the delivery time. The value can be either better, the same or worse in comparision to the original product.

difference.description: The delivery time difference. The value is always positive.

OptimizationPriceInfo.title: OptimizationPriceInfo
OptimizationPriceInfo.description: Representation of a relevant field for an optimization.

result.description: The comparison result for the price. The value can be either better, the same or worse in comparision to the original product.

difference.description: The price difference. The value is always positive.

OptimizationsBulkRequest.title: OptimizationsBulkRequest
OptimizationsBulkRequest.description: Representation of a search request for optimizations.

items.description: List of items to search optimizations for.

item_id.description: Unique item identifier that is returned in the response.

quantity.description: Quantity the optimizations should be based on.

product_id.description: Stable product identifiers. If this field is provided all following fields will be ignored.

supplier_pid.description: Product identifier of the supplier, e.g. supplier sku or item number.

manufacturer_pid.description: Product identifier of the manufacturer, e.g. manufacturers article number.

unit_price.description: Price for a single order unit.

item_price.description: Price for one single item if a packaging unit and packaging quantity is given.

OptimizationsBulkResponse.title: OptimizationsBulkResponse
OptimizationsBulkResponse.description: Representation of a search response for optimizations.

items.description: List of optimizations grouped by unique item identifier.

item_id.description: Unique item identifier from the request.

type.description:
An absolute URI that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced,
it SHOULD provide human-readable documentation for the problem type
(e.g., using HTML).

title.description:
A short, summary of the problem type. Written in english and readable
for engineers (usually not suited for non technical stakeholders and
not localized); example: Service Unavailable

status.description:
The HTTP status code generated by the origin server for this occurrence
of the problem.

detail.description:
A human readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the
problem.

instance.description:
An absolute URI that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.
It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.
